query: Show studies written by Oliver Sturman between 2018 and 2020, excluding those published in Science. I’m particularly interested in papers related to the following sentence: Typically, behavioral analysis relies on commercial equipment to track an animal's path of movement or measure the time spent in specific areas of testing arenas. Include only papers mentioning commercial solutions. I’m not interested in papers mentioning rodent tracking or SIPEC.

keywords.Semantic Query: Typically, behavioral analysis relies on commercial equipment to track an animal's path of movement or measure the time spent in specific areas of testing arenas.

ground_truth_papers: Deep learning-based behavioral analysis reaches human accuracy and is capable of outperforming commercial solutions.
